text: Pate's Grammar School is a grammar school in Gloucestershire, England. It was started in 1574 by Richard Pate. In 1986 Pate's Grammar School for Girls and Cheltenham Grammar School for Boys were put together. In 2013 The Times called it the fourth best secondary state school in the UK.http://www.gloucestershireecho.co.uk/Pate-8217-s-Grammar-School-Cheltenham- shoots/story-20105901-detail/story.html ==References== Category:Gloucestershire Category:Grammar schools in England Category:16th- century establishments in England Category:1570s establishments in Europe
title: Pate's Grammar School
